text: I have to say that this office really has it together, they are so organized and friendly!  Dr. Philippe Laban is a great dentist, very friendly and professional.
Total bill for this horrible service? Over $8Gs.
THIS RESTAURANT SUCKS, ONE STAR ALL THE WAY, CANT BELIEVE ANYONE WOULD EVER EAT HERE. FOOD IS DISGUSTING. NEVER COMING BACK AGAIN.
The food was amazing. The waiters were always there for us and were very friendly. I can't wait to come back again in the future!
The food was good, but the service was horrible. Waited an entire hour before our food arrived.
